page.title: 02 ATTITUDES
page.content: We like living in the country because there is a lot of open space and its very green everywhere. You can go exploring and play where there is no one to disturb you. I expect when we are older we will want to go to discos and things like they do in Stroud but at the moment its much better as it is. The nice thing about the country is that everybody knows everyone else, which is very nice for the children. When we are in trouble we know that we can go to anyone for help. When new people move into the village they very soon meet everyone else and the children soon make new friends. For a small village there is quite a lot to do if you are a grownup, too. There are lots of clubs to join. We must take care of country villages so that everyone can enjoy them.
